justification: "At the end of the Frame Selection Phase, participants completed the General Risk Propensity Scale (GRiPS), an eight-question questionnaire, to assess their general risk propensity."
"In order to investigate individuals' preference for making choices in either a gain or loss frame, we designed a new paradigm, the Frame Selection Task (FST)."

measured_by: risky choice selections in the initial phase of the Frame Selection Task
justification: "We measured risk preference by solely analyzing risky choices made in the initial phase of the study."
